segments.text: I'm struck by the window above the sink, it's such a focal point.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the panes, I can clearly see a calm, well-kept garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Thereâ€™s a neat path with low bushes, and everything looks peaceful outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark, almost absurd contrast to the growing watery disaster inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight from that window highlights the ordinary domestic setting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it also illuminates the cascading water and the children's secret adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost wish the woman would just glance out and see the normalcy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Maybe then she would notice the chaotic situation right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still relentlessly pouring over the sink's edge, creating a nasty puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite frustrating to witness such blatant obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sense of calm from the outside makes the internal mess seem even more alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything seems so quiet, yet a disaster is clearly brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR
